item.title: What is this?
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I hate that error. I spent a day trying to figure out an error I had. I spent a lot of time coding and for some reason the LoadBMPs; procedure was erased by accident, and everytime I ran the script I would get runtime errors. Made me go insane until I realized my mistake. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

@Cheesehunk wrote:

Nope, works fine then…

LoadBitmaps;
If(Findbitmap(Tool, x ,y))Then[/scar]

item.title: What is this?
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

Access Violtion, self explanatory, really.

It’s because the script hasn’t loaded the bitmaps. Put “LoadBitmaps;” at the start of the script (The procedure containing the bitmaps).

Notice the first line you get the error on:
[scar]
If(Findbitmap(Tool, x ,y))Then
[/scar]

Tool contains no data since it hasn’t been loaded

Read full topic

item.title: What is this?
item.dc:creator: @Sebo Sebo
item.description:
@Sebo wrote:

[scar][Runtime Error] : Exception: Access violation at address 00650650 in module ‘scar.exe’. Read of address 00000000 in line 205 in script [/scar]

From this script.

[scar]{++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++]
[++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++]
[++ Sebo’s RuneScape Window Opener/Loginer ++]
[+ Made by: Sebo! +]
[+ Credits- Weibs, And all the people who help me on Mopar. +]
[+ Setup Lines/Username/Password Setup on - 47-48 +]
[+ Enjoi, my script +]
[+ Other: I spent over 6 weeks perfecting this script. +]
[+ Some bugs, Working it out +]
[+ And I acctually might start using SRL, Once I Furgure out how to. +]
[+ Use it. +]
[++ 300+ Lines of Script!!! ++]
[+++ Final RuneScape Window Opener R.I.P. +++]
[++++++++++++++ ++++++++++++++]
[++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++}

Program RuneScape_Opener;

{-----------------------------------]
| Comment me On Mopar, Username = |
| Sebo (Well Duhhh.) |
[-----------------------------------}

{ |—|
|—|
|—|
-----------
---------/
-------/
-----/
—/
-/
-
Go Down For Setup! }

Var
Login,Existing,Tool,Play,x,y:Integer;
Start: String;

Const
{++++++++++++++Start Setup+++++++++++++++++}
//++++++++++++ ++++++++++++//
UserName = ‘UserName’; //Username HERE
PassWord = ‘PassWord’; //Password HERE
//++++++++++++ ++++++++++++//
{+++++++++++++++End Setup++++++++++++++++++}

//--------------------------------------------------------------|
{ Dont Touch Anymore if Your A LEECHER. *
| |
|---------------------------------------------------------------}

‘572’);

Procedure IE_Finder;
Begin
PlaySound(‘C:\WINDOWS\Media\Windows Popup.wav’);
Start:=Readln(‘Start Script?’);
Wait(1500);
Writeln(‘You Said ‘+Start+’, Thanks for using my Runescape’);
Writeln(‘Window Opener and loginer!’);
If(Findbitmap(Tool, x ,y))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEx(x, y, 7, 9, 15, 68, 10);
Wait(150+Random(150));
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(43);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(4000);
End;

Procedure BoredMouse;
Begin
Repeat
MoveMouseSmoothEx(500+Random(500),250+Random(500), 7, 9, 15, 68, 10);
Wait(500+Random(500));
Until(Findcolor(x, y, 14258485, 5, 22, 971, 253));
End;

Procedure IE_Tool;
Begin
If(FindColor(x, y, 14258485, 5, 22, 971, 253))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x, y, 7, 9, 15, 68, 10);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(6000)
End;

Procedure RuneScape;
Begin
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(75+Random(75));
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(75+Random(75));
SendKeys(‘w’);
Wait(75+Random(75));
SendKeys(’.’);
Wait(75+Random(75));
SendKeys(‘R’);
Wait(75+Random(75));
SendKeys(‘u’);
Wait(75+Random(75));
SendKeys(‘ne’);
Wait(75+Random(75));
SendKeys(‘Sc’);
Wait(75+Random(75));
SendKeys(‘a’);
Wait(75+Random(75));
SendKeys(‘p’);
Wait(75+Random(75));
SendKeys(‘e’);
Wait(75+Random(75));
SendKeys(’.’);
Wait(75+Random(75));
SendKeys(‘co’);
Wait(75+Random(75));
SendKeys(‘m’ +chr(13));
Wait(75+Random(75));
Wait(4000+Random(5000));
End;

Procedure FindThatGame;
Begin
If(FindBitmap(Play, x, y))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEx(x, y, 7, 9, 15, 68, 10);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(150);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(2500);
If(FindColorTolerance(x, y, 66104, 556, 331, 783, 449, 10))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x, y, 7, 9, 15, 68, 10);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(1500);
FindColor(x, y, 2109487, 340, 246, 578, 384);
Wait(500);
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x, y, 7, 9, 15, 68, 10);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(4000);
Repeat //
MoveMouseSmoothEx(500+Random(500),250+Random(500),15 ,15 ,35 ,50 ,15);
Wait(1500+Random(1500));
Until(FindBitmap(Existing, x, y));
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x, y, 7, 9, 15, 68, 10);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(1500);
SendKeys(UserName+chr(13));
Wait(257);
SendKeys(PassWord);
Wait(650);
MoveMouseSmoothEX(x, y, 7, 9, 15, 68, 10);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
HoldMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(8); //Realistic Human Mouse Click
ReleaseMouse(x, y, True); //Kinda like antiBan =)
Wait(3458);
End;

Procedure Ender;
Begin
If(FindBitmap(Login, x, y))Then
MoveMouseSmoothEx(x, y, 7, 9, 15, 68, 10);
ClickMouse(x, y, True);
Wait(1500+Random(1500));
End;

{--------------------------------------------------------]
[The Script Will Hide itself to make it look like it’s a ]
[Human or a GHOST! Oooohhh, Spooky! ]
[--------------------------------------------------------}
Procedure Credits;
begin
Writeln(’#########################################################’)
WriteLn(’#Thanks for using Sebos… #’)
WriteLn(’#RuneScape Window Opener! #’)
WriteLn(’#For the person / People, who made the F1 Thing #’)
WriteLn(’#And Most Of All Thanks To Kaitnieks For Creating SCAR! #’)
WriteLn(’#########################################################’)
end;

{+++++++++++++++++++++++++]
[ MAIN LOOP ]
[ Don’t Touch ]
[+++++++++++++++++++++++++}

Begin
IE_Finder;
Getself.Hide;
BoredMouse;
IE_Tool;
RuneScape;
FindThatGame;
Credits;
Ender;
GetSelf.Show;
End.[/scar]

I was just making this script neater. and I got this error

Read full topic
